content.description:
Directions: Answers must be in essay form. Outline form is not acceptable. Labeled diagrams may be used to supplement discussion, but in no case will a diagram alone suffice. It is important that you read each question completely before
you begin.

Charles Darwin proposed that evolution by natural selection was the basis for the differences that he saw in similar organisms as he traveled and collected specimens in South America and on the Galapagos Islands.
content.question: Explain the theory of evolution by natural selection as presented by Darwin.

frqParts.text: Explain the theory of evolution by natural selection as presented by Darwin.
